item.title: VIAGGIO Marcopolo G7 ETS2 v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 17, 2025

VIAGGIO Marcopolo G7 ETS2 v1.0 ETS2

The “VIAGGIO Marcopolo G7 ETS 2” refers to a very popular category of bus mods for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) that brings various models from the Marcopolo Viaggio G7 line into the game. The Marcopolo Viaggio G7 is a well-known Brazilian coach bus, commonly used for intercity and sometimes urban routes, especially in South America.
There are several modders and teams who have created Viaggio G7 mods for ETS2, and each may have slightly different features and levels of detail. Some of the most well-known creators and details you might find include:

**Common Features of Marcopolo Viaggio G7 Mods:**

* **Diverse Models:** While the prompt specifies “Viaggio G7,” mods often include various sub-models within the G7 generation, such as:

* **Viaggio G7 1050:** A very common model, often with options for 4×2 chassis.

* **Paradiso G7 1200:** A larger, more luxurious coach, also part of the G7 series. Some mods might differentiate between Viaggio (simpler, shorter routes) and Paradiso (long-distance, more amenities).

* **Chassis Options:**

* **Scania:** K310, K360, K400, K440, K450 (especially for 6×2 configurations).

* **Mercedes-Benz:** O500RSD, O500RSDD, O500RS.

* **Volvo:** Some mods feature Volvo chassis (e.g., B380R, B420R).

* **Highly Detailed 3D Models:** Modders strive for realism, so these mods usually feature:

* Accurate exterior models with realistic textures.

* Detailed interiors, often with functional dashboards, animated pedals, and realistic lighting.

* Passenger models (sometimes 3D, sometimes just textures) that appear when picking up/dropping off.

* **Customization Options:**

* **Skins/Liveries:** A vast array of real-world Brazilian bus company skins (e.g., Gontijo, Itapemirim, Eucatur, etc.), plus editable skins.

* **Interior Variations:** Different seat textures, curtain options, and sometimes dashboard colors.

* **Accessories:** Customizable mirrors, lights (internal and external), hubcaps, spoilers, and sometimes even animated items like a “Para-sol” rope.

* **Air Conditioning:** Often includes animated air conditioning units.

* **Realistic Physics and Sounds:** Mods aim for a driving experience that mimics a real bus, with:

* Authentic engine sounds specific to the chosen chassis (Scania, Mercedes, Volvo).

* Realistic suspension and handling.

* Functional animations like door opening/closing, window animations, and even luggage compartment animations.

* **Compatibility:**

* Constantly updated to be compatible with the latest ETS2 game versions (e.g., 1.51.x, 1.52.x, 1.53.x, 1.54.x).

* Designed to work with popular Brazilian maps (EAA, RBR, RCBRASIL, Eldorado) and often with the base map and other major maps like ProMods.

* **In-Game Integration:**

* Purchasable in the truck/bus dealer (often appearing under the associated truck brand, e.g., Scania or Mercedes).

* Available for quick jobs and the freight market, allowing you to transport passengers or cargo.

**Notable Modders/Teams:**

* **Fábio Contier (Mods Personalizados 3D):** Known for highly detailed and often premium (paid) bus mods, including various G7 models, often with extensive customization and animations. They provide free updates for their mods.

* **EdsonV12 / Norman Mods:** Another prominent modder/team with popular G7 models, sometimes offering free versions or updates.

* **B4D Brasil:** This team also creates high-quality bus mods, including Viaggio/Paradiso G7 versions, with a focus on realism.

* **DC3D:** Also known for detailed bus mods, including G7 models with various chassis options.

**Where to Find and Download:**

* **Modder’s Official Websites/YouTube Channels:** Many modders, like Fábio Contier, B4D Brasil, Norman Mods, and DC3D, have their own websites or YouTube channels where they showcase their mods and provide download links (sometimes free, sometimes paid or for members).

* **Modding Forums and Websites:** Sites like https://www.google.com/search?q=ETS2BusMod.com, TruckyMods.io, and other dedicated ETS2 mod sites often host these mods or provide links to them.

* **Sharemods:** A common file hosting service where many ETS2 mods are uploaded.

* **Steam Workshop:** While less common for very custom, detailed Brazilian bus mods, some simpler or community-edited versions might be found there.

When downloading, always ensure compatibility with your ETS2 version and get mods from reputable sources to avoid issues.

Credits: ADV

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Caçamba Deslizante Randon ETS 2 BY FG v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 17, 2025

Caçamba Deslizante Randon ETS 2 BY FG v1.0 ETS2

The “Caçamba Deslizante Randon ETS 2 BY FG” refers to a mod for the game Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2), created by “FG” (Fernando Gamer, likely a modder or a group of modders). This mod introduces a Randon sliding tipper trailer into the game. Here’s a breakdown of what you’ll find regarding this mod:

Key Features and Details:
Randon Sliding Tipper: This is the main focus, a highly detailed and optimized model of a Randon sliding tipper trailer.

Customization Options: Based on videos and descriptions, it usually includes:
– Multiple chassis variations (e.g., 3-axis, 4-axis, vanderléia).
– Various fender (paralama) options (plastic, painted, different styles).
– Different lighting options (foguinho laranja, vermelho, lanternas).
– Paintable body, allowing users to customize the color.
– Animated cargo variations.
– Cable support.
– Advanced Coupling.
Optimization : Reviewers and modders often highlight that the mod is “bem otimizada” (well-optimized) and “bem levinha” (very light), meaning it runs smoothly in the game without significant performance drops.

In-Game Integration:
– It’s usually purchasable in-game.
– Available in the freight market and quick jobs (for standard game cargoes and compatible maps).
– Can be found in AI traffic.
Compatibility: The mod is frequently updated to be compatible with the latest versions of ETS2 (e.g., 1.47, 1.49, 1.50, 1.51, 1.53, 1.54 as of recent updates). It’s designed to work with various maps like RCBRASIL, MHA, ProMods, TSM, EAA, RBR, and Eldorado.

Credits: FG

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: MASCARELLO ROMA R8 MULT LW GAMES v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 17, 2025

MASCARELLO ROMA R8 MULT LW GAMES v1.0 ETS2

The “MASCARELLO ROMA R8 MULTI LW GAMES” refers to a popular bus mod for the game Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2), created by “LW Games” (likely a modder or modding group). This mod brings the Mascarello Roma R8, a modern and high-quality Brazilian coach bus, into the game. Here’s what you can typically expect from this mod:

Key Features and Details:
Mascarello Roma R8 Model: The mod features a highly detailed and realistic 3D model of the Mascarello Roma R8 bus. Modders like LW Games are known for their attention to detail, so the interior and exterior are usually well-replicated.
“Multi” Version: The “Multi” in the name suggests that this version of the mod offers a variety of customization options and chassis configurations.

This often includes:
Chassis Options : Various chassis types, such as 4×2, 6×2 (with different rear axle configurations), and potentially other options depending on the real-life bus variants. Popular chassis include those from Scania (e.g., K400IB, K440IB, K450IB) and Mercedes-Benz (e.g., O500RSD, O500RSDD).
Engines and Transmissions : Different engine options with varying power outputs and corresponding transmission choices to match the real bus specifications.
Skins and Paint Jobs : A wide array of liveries and paint schemes, often including real-world Brazilian bus company skins, as well as customizable paint options.
Interior Customization: Options for different interior details, such as seat colors, curtain types, dashboard variations, and possibly even functional accessories.
Accessories: Customizable external accessories like mirrors, lights (including different types of headlights, taillights, and additional markers), and even hubcaps.
Realistic Physics and Sounds: Good bus mods aim for realistic driving physics and authentic engine sounds to enhance the immersion.
In-Game Integration:

Credits: LW

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD
